metadata.title: AKS Malicious Tool Execution (Miners, Scanners)
metadata.description: Detects execution of known malicious tools and crypto miners based on their specific CLI output and banners in container logs.

properties.description: Detects execution of known malicious tools and crypto miners based on their specific CLI output and banners in container logs.
properties.query:
let ToolBanners = dynamic([
    "Starting Nmap",
    "Masscan: outputting results",
    "sqlmap identified the following injection point",
    "Hydra (https://github.com/vanhauser-thc/thc-hydra)",
    "XMRig",
    "accepted share",
    "stratum+tcp",
    "wallet address",
    "minerd",
    "xmrig-proxy",
    "linPEAS",
    "winPEAS",
    "LinEnum"
]);
ContainerLog
| where TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
| where LogEntry has_any (ToolBanners)
| extend
    ContainerId = ContainerID,
    LogMessage = LogEntry,
    PodName = extract("pod=([^,]+)", 1, tostring(parse_json(LogEntrySource))),
    Namespace = extract("namespace=([^,]+)", 1, tostring(parse_json(LogEntrySource)))
| join kind=leftouter (
    KubePodInventory
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(1h)
    | distinct ContainerID, PodName = Name, Namespace, ClusterName, ContainerName
) on $left.ContainerId == $right.ContainerID
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    ClusterName,
    Namespace,
    PodName,
    ContainerName,
    ContainerId,
    LogMessage
| summarize
    FirstSeen = min(TimeGenerated),
    LastSeen = max(TimeGenerated),
    Count = count()
    by ClusterName, Namespace, PodName, ContainerName, LogMessage

alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: Execution of malicious tool or miner detected in container '{{ContainerName}}' in pod '{{PodName}}'. Log: {{LogMessage}}
